* **Highlight the value to Bob:** I remind Bob of the value the product holds for him, hoping to persuade him to compromise.

This counteroffer aims to strike a balance between maximizing my profit and reaching a deal within the limited rounds. I remain open to further negotiation, but I will not go below $850,000.
